title: Create an Event Floor Plan
description: An event planner is working with a client to design the floor plan for a trade show with 50 exhibitor booths.

tasks.description: Open the venue's floor plan design software for the main exhibition hall.
Add 50 standard 10x10 foot booths to the floor plan, ensuring proper spacing for aisles.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lays out the booths according to fire code and accessibility standards.

tasks.description: Add other elements like the registration desk, a food court area, and restrooms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the detailed floor plan.

tasks.description: Save the floor plan and share it with the client for their approval.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a PDF of the floor plan to the client.
